Repository Name Unauthorized: National Archives of the Marianist Province of the United States
Notes: The Marianist Province Archives contain the permanent record of governance and administration of the historic and current provinces of the Society of Mary in the United States, 1849 to present. Photographs, blueprints and plans, and maps also document the Marianist imprint on the United States. The archives are the private files of the Provincial Superior and his staff. Any access to these records is granted under his authority.
